Serialized Form

  • Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

    • Class it.polimi.ingsw.client.ClientMessage extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • action
          java.lang.String action
          It is the action performed by the client during his turn.
        • god
          God god
          It is the god chosen by the client.
        • levelToBuild
          int levelToBuild
          It tells how many level the client wants to build.
        • name
          java.lang.String name
          It is the name of the client
        • space1
          int[] space1
          It is the space chosen by the client.
        • space2
          int[] space2
          It is the second space chosen by the client when he's placing his workers.

    • Class it.polimi.ingsw.client.SettingGameMessage extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • creatingNewGame
          boolean creatingNewGame
          True if the client wants to create a new game and play with friends
        • gameID
          int gameID
          It is the game ID of the match
        • nickname
          java.lang.String nickname
          It is the client's nickname
        • numberOfPlayer
          int numberOfPlayer
          It is the number of player of the match
        • playingExistingMatch
          boolean playingExistingMatch
          True if the client wants to play an existing match with friends

        • name1
          java.lang.String name1
        • name2
          java.lang.String name2
        • name3
          java.lang.String name3
        • table
          java.lang.String[][] table
          Two-dimensional string array used to briefly describe the game table. A string is composed as follows: (A,B,C if there is a worker of a player on that cell, V otherwise) + (0,1,2,3 space height) + (N or D if there is a dome)
